comments:
When double clicking on a word in the debug perspective/console view the
following exception is thrown. The word is in my case is followed by a opening
bracket. The console shows the following text (only snippet):
=======================================================================
/calculator/calculate.do
resolveEntity('-//Sun Microsystems, Inc.//DTD Web Application 2.3//EN',
'http://java.sun.com/j2ee/dtds/web-app_2_3.dtd')
 Not registered, use system identifier
=======================================================================
